data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Reading with the kick-off.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a first substitution, with Lewis Gibson replacing Omar Richards.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
QPR kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Albert Adomah is replacing Chris Willock for QPR at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Tomas Esteves with Tom Holmes. This is the second substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
Reading make their third substitution with Michael Olise replacing Sone Aluko.
Tom Carroll for QPR has been booked by Tony Harrington and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Mark Warburton is making the team's second substitution at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium with Todd Kane replacing Osman Kakay.
The home team have replaced Bright Osayi-Samuel with Macauley Bonne. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Tom McIntyre is replacing Sam Baldock for Reading at Kiyan Prince Foundation Stadium.
In the minute 89, Goal! Michael Olise gives Reading a 0-1 lead in London.
